question: I am in the U.S. on a Visa and don’t qualify for Medicaid coverage because of my visa status.  Will my premiums for private health insurance go down?
text:
I am in the U.S. on a Visa and dont qualify for Medicaid coverage because of my visa status.  Will my premiums for private health insurance go down?
          
        
If you are in the U.S. on a Visa, you may qualify for coverage through Pennie.
 Depending on your income,
you may qualify for significant financial assistance, including
premiums as low as $2/month.
